title: A Promising Garden ~ My Zyra Painting!
body:
https://41.media.tumblr.com/2166218b7e34088911fb9c070966bf00/tumblr_nt1mn0MNHe1qk32lpo1_1280.png

https://cdn.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/001/076/668/large/thomas-randby-finalmaybecompressed.jpg?1439506892

https://41.media.tumblr.com/88046462f4e64d73542642896ce1665e/tumblr_nt1mn0MNHe1qk32lpo2_540.png

(usually links just embed with no trouble on the boards for me, but in this case I'm not seeing them so sorry for the extra clicking if they don't show up!)

Hey guys! I post static character and skin concepts here pretty often but I've never really tried to make a Splash art sort of illustration, and wanted to try it out and step out of my comfort zone! I learned a lot in the process, and had a lot of fun working on this! Zyra is one of my favorite champions to play as support, mostly because she breaks the "peaceful protector" support trope in favor of something more along the lines of "I'm going to choke the life out of you with plants." It was more of an exercise than anything, but I'm pretty happy with the end result and wanted to share it!

replies.body: wow this is really nice.  Good work.
No, no, no, this is how you do it: "Excellent work! How soon can you begin working for us?"
New splash?
Riot needs to hire you.
Please make Lissandra one !
OOOOH I WANT TO! Lissandra was the newest champ released back when I first started playing!

Please, please make a Lissandra splash in the same style - with all haste! :D

http://i.imgur.com/wZ5431X.jpg
Thanks , i'll be waiting for it <3
sad....
Beautiful work!!!

Question 1: Do you take requests? @_@

Question 2: If yes, then would you think of doing a similar picture of Lissandra? <3
Thirsty virgin alert

Thirsty, yes. I thirst for more of this artist's work, and Lissandra is one of my mains.
Virgin, not quite. Nice try at a pointless insult though. :)
I wanted a response from you, not your older brother.
I don't have an older brother, so you are currently 0 for 2 on insults. I suggest you quit while you're behind.
"0 and 2" lol u wot m8 the last thing you said doesn't count as an insult, you merely pointed out your opinion. Get original bro and reply when you have something good.

It doesn't count as an insult because it wasn't one. I'm not trying to insult you because I am more mature than that. If you really want to keep this going then fine, but know that you're only making yourself look foolish.
Ok I admit it was a joke I'll stop
would you mind doing one for nami and fizz together riding namis ult
Swimmingly! That I'd like to see as well. :D
better than her current splash, nice! :D
What's the difference between image 1 and image 2?
One is a little bit higher res! None of them were embedding for me either when I first made the thread so i tossed a few options up to see if any of them would!
Cool, keep up the good work.
This is amazing great job!

May I suggest you in-corporate a viper kind of sense to the vines. I fell the vines should be more tightly woven around her arms and pointing away from her. They look like their about to poke her hands. Besides that the picture is amazing. I like to draw and paint but im still a amateur.
May I have the permission to replace the stock splash in the client with this?

I hope you don't mind. :)
...because your work IS better than the current stock splash.
_4 hours is a small lifetime online._

I had a poke around the internet and noticed you also knows how to customize the in-client splashes, but do you happen to know where the loading splashes are located as well? I've been trying to figure that out for some time now. I suspect they are inside some compressed container somewhere.

Edit: I have now read/heard how to replace the loadscreen and the ingame HUD files (ingame champion icons and so on), but...it looks like some work to do it, as I don't yet have all the programs required.
Wow, that's awesome! How many hours?
Honestly this looks exactly like something I'd expect to see in the game.
I actually swapped out my game files so this is her classic splash and icon in game, haha. It feels really cool to see my work implemented!

Psst since boards doesn't have PMs I just saw this idea and since you're my favorite fan artist....
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5mkjVeF5-riot-can-we-expect-a-new-legendary-skin-maybe-before-the-end-of-september?comment=0000000e00000000

pl0x? <3

wow this is legendary...

pls make yasuo

very well done, keep up the good work

you got some skills
Dang that's impressive. Well done**_!_**
That's good enough to be an actual splashart! Good work!
Nice plant drawing its... amaizeing
riot make this the new splash

This is excellent, well done! My one critique would be that her breasts seem a little exaggerated- not sure if feel this way because of the size, angle, or the highlight drawing your eye. Still, well done!
Well done! Incredible detail!
That is some fine shrubbery.
WOW! :D BEAUTIFUL! :D
Pro quality. This could be Zyra splash art and no one would even know it was a community piece.
That choker is beautiful, and the pose is genius. Looks likes she's the blossoming flower, but she's actually just crossing her legs.
Can't say that I like picture, but I like your style mate. Show us something else, great job, keep working!
plot twist: he got that off the internet
GIVE DIS MAN A {{item:2010}} !

That's really, really nice. I like it. +1

What software? (I take it that you didn't make it by hand... right? If you did then you have an AMAZING hand.) 

How long did it take you?

Thats how I look :3 

Lissandra has nosebleed over 9 000 x)
But you shouldn't see her as support... The mage is her true power.

Btw: do you have a deviant art or can I share it there for you?
Edit 1: Ah. I found your deviant art ^^
